title: Online International Business: Project-Based Learning Through a Glocal Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Learners from various national backgrounds analyze international business cases and conduct projects primarily using smartphones. Learning effectiveness is measured through mixed research methodologies (surveys, discussions, portfolios).

learning_goals: Learners design glocal strategies to apply international business theories across diverse cultural contexts.
Learners complete a project comparing market environments in three or more countries using collaborative platforms via mobile devices.
Learners propose a decision-making framework in online discussions that accounts for cultural differences.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
